i setup Beryl yesterday, damn sexy: has anyone had issue playing encrypted dvd's even after installing all the necessary files such as libdvdcss2, w32codecs, totem-xine, etc..?
totem-xine is not necessary to play DVD's only for DVD menu browsing.
you also dont need w32codecs to play DVDs if you've got the gstreamer-ffmpeg stuff installed with totem (not totem-xine)
